title: FS: T206 Dahlen, Smith, Magee, Browne - all PSA

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Dahlen, Smith, Magee, Browne - all PSA
posts.post_content:
I currently have the following for sale:

T206 Frank Smith (Chicago), Sweet Caporal, PSA 3, $40;
T206 Sherry Magee, Sweet Caporal, PSA 2, $50;

T206 George Brown (Browne, Chicago), Piedmont, SOLD, thanks Dave

T206 Bill Dahlen (Boston), Piedmont, PSA 4, **SOLD, thanks Larry**

Shipping with signature confirmation included in prices.  Front and back scans are below.  Paypal fine with no additional surcharge.  Please email me at [url]aamoniz@yahoo.com[/url] if you would like any!

Regards,
Adam
[url]aamoniz@yahoo.com[/url]
Prices dropped on the 2 remaining cards.
Final price drops on 2 remaining cards, please email me at [url]aamoniz@yahoo.com[/url] if you would like either or both!
